title: Food for thought
content:
let's face it. type is delicous. it has juicy dimensions that go   
beyond the printed page and into another dimension. type can look so good that somtimes i just wanna eat it all up. anyone else have any ideas about food and type?
author: kimby

comments.content:
I may have an idea or two . . . Ever heard of the Font Diner?   
   
Stuart :D
